sentences.en: Although plant growth was affected by the herbicide, no evidence of repression or derepression was observed.
sentences.cn: 尽管植物的生长受到除草剂的影响, 但还未观察到阻遏或解阻遏的证据.

sentences.en: As for political repression, few young Chinese experience it.
sentences.cn: 至于政治压抑, 极少数年轻人曾切身经历过.

sentences.en: Batista was keeping himself in power only by a mounting use of repression, corruption and violence.
sentences.cn: 巴蒂斯塔只是靠着越来越频繁地使用镇压, 行贿和暴力来维持其统治.

sentences.en: Consequently he threw Carrie into repression, which was irritating.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉的心里话得不到倾吐,感到受了压抑, 心里很不痛快.

sentences.en: Enzyme repression was discovered by Jacques Monod in 1953.
sentences.cn: 酶的阻遏作用是Monod于1953年发现的.

sentences.en: His economic successes were creating new political realities which could not be dealt with by repression.
sentences.cn: 他的经济成就造成的新的政治现实是不能用镇压手段来对付的.

sentences.en: In a very real sense, post - war repression was the continuation of the war.
sentences.cn: 就真正意义上来说, 战后经济衰退就是战争的继续.

sentences.en: It requires feeling , repression, thus :'The usual crowd of children accosted them for alms.'
sentences.cn: 要这么说, ‘ 马路上常见的乞儿向他们乞讨.'”

sentences.en: Lei - ring and general wear - resistant nitrile rubber by dipping the fabric from repression.
sentences.cn: 蕾形密封圈一般由丁腈橡胶和 耐磨 的浸胶织物压制而成.
受抑制使他表现得更糟.

sentences.en: The main theme is the repression of cattle stealing.
sentences.cn: 主要精神是镇压盗窃牲畜.

sentences.en: The repression of your true feelings is harmful to your health.
sentences.cn: 压抑你的真实感情有害健康.

sentences.en: They wanted to fight all forms of injustice and repression.
sentences.cn: 他们要与各种形式的不公正和压制行为作斗争.

sentences.en: This new and elemental environment seemed to call for a savage repression.
sentences.cn: 这新的粗野的环境要求的似乎是一种野蛮的约束.

words.tran_cn: 重压；补加压力；[机] 再压
抑制；镇压；约束（repress的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: when someone does not allow themselves to express feelings or desires which they are ashamed of, especially sexual ones – used when you think someone should express these feelings
